ygData.subject: RE: Post Patch Procing
ygData.msgSnippet: I think this will make bards popular again in the front ranks. Who cares if Naggy or Vox drops one of our buffs? It s coming back up an a few seconds again
ygData.messageBody:
I think this will make bards popular again in the front ranks. Who cares if
Naggy or Vox drops one of our buffs? It's coming back up an a few seconds
again anyway. :) You would still need to do the useless buff tactic so you
don't get caught short and have a little bit of play.

Good Journey

Sineras Silverlyre, The Divine Alliance (Cazic-Thule)

-----Original Message-----
From: Bobby [mailto:merlin26@...]
Sent: Friday, January 21, 2000 11:34 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Post Patch Procing


From: "Bobby" <merlin26@...>

The one thing we did on nagga since he removes buffs.. we made a "useless
buff line" we would buff everyone with all the useless enchantments THEN
last we would do the resist hp buffs etc... it worked great.. naga would
remobe the useless buffs first. :)



Tuldar
45th bard Tarew marr....
HI maeve.. he was there to in all his red beard!..
